tab_infos.Name: picture
tab_infos.Description: The url of the genre picture. Add 'size' parameter to the url to change size. Can be 'small', 'medium', 'big', 'xl'

tab_infos.Name: picture_small
tab_infos.Description: The url of the genre picture in size small.

tab_infos.Name: picture_medium
tab_infos.Description: The url of the genre picture in size medium.

tab_infos.Name: picture_big
tab_infos.Description: The url of the genre picture in size big.

tab_infos.Name: picture_xl
tab_infos.Description: The url of the genre picture in size xl.

tab_connections.Name: genre / artists
tab_connections.Description: Returns all artists for a genre

tab_connections.Name: genre / podcasts
tab_connections.Description: Returns all podcasts for a genre
tab_connections.Returns: A list of object of type podcast

tab_connections.Name: genre / radios
tab_connections.Description: Returns all radios for a genre
